p: These 1000 points were then randomly separated into two groups, one used for calibration (70% of the points) and the remaining 30% used for validation which allowed assessing the Overall Accuracy and Cohen’s Kappa for each image ( Lehmann et al., 2017; Müllerová et al., 2017b). To obtain the maps of A. longifolia flower cover/m 2 we applied a focal filter to the binary map where the window size varied according to the image resolution ( Table 1 ), effectively resampling each image to 1 m 2.
